website_summaries.verdict: Nvidia's GeForce RTX 2060 Super straddles the fine line between a video card made for esports and one for AAA gaming performance, and delivers consistently on each side where it matters most.
pros: Strong results in high-refresh gaming and 1440p
cons: Not powerful enough to handle all AAA games at higher resolutions

customer_reviews.title: Nice One MSI
customer_reviews.text: Pay slightly more for the Bling RGB factor but performance is stellar at 1080p and 1440p. As I'm only a casual Gamer, I think this will do me nicely for several years. Also the Metal Backplate adds rigidity and class to the Card. The Card is Silent most of the time too 😀
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: A solid worker :)
customer_reviews.text: You know what, it’s only a 2060 super but it does it’s best for you, some games I play on highest settings and it does start to get hot and noisy but the noise level isn’t that bad, but the warmth of the card can be felt through the glass side panelling.... But as I said if you’re looking for a simple card that can load almost every hame with decent frames on decent settings, with easy to install drivers then this isn’t a bad shout ( although I will get a 2070S or 2080 eventually)
customer_reviews.author: David Collard

customer_reviews.title: She's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful card this is, stays cool with anything I throw at it and looks great. Definitely worth the tad extra for the Msi model as in the end we wanna look beautiful aswel as powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Hardman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: No issues. Runs like a beast. The idle temperature (52) is a bit high though? I don't think it's worth the high price but I bought it to replace an old faulty Asus GPU.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brill
customer_reviews.text: It a brilliant bit of tech and great for value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Does what I wanted and more - allowed me to go from console gaming to pc in a heartbeat, let alone the possibility of gaming at 240fps++ (most games run at around 450-500)
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and it worked fine for 3 weeks until it broke. Very disappointed but I’m glad that the seller at least refunded my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V3RA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great, fast delivery good package, working great, hope it will stay like this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrejs

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: The fans don’t even spin on Low level gaming because the heat pipes are so good
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Msi best gpu
customer_reviews.text: Very good gpu best one I had for long time never over clocked it has u dont need to play all aa games with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not have a problem
customer_reviews.text: There is no problem you will fined on this graphics card. Dose everything well on max settings on all my games
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Works perfectly ! a lot better than my old
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: VERY noisy, I wouldn't buy it nowadays. NOT suggested
customer_reviews.text: After three months of use(when the warranty wasn't valid after a month), the graphic card started doing noises as you can see at the video(and is just without any games on, it's with my desktop and nothing else). The noises seem fun(irony on) because depends on what you have on the screen. If it's a game very colourful it becomes noisier and noisier... This is very annoying because of the unexpected noise and because of how loud it is. I'm very disappointed and I wouldn't buy it nor suggest it to anyone. I have tried to re-install all drivers, run tests and nothing the noise won't go.
customer_reviews.author: Jordi Vicens

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: All round solid GPU, runs most games at 70fps on 1440p. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

product_meta.title: MSI NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 2060 SUPER GAMING X Graphics Card '8GB GDDR6, 1695Hz, RGB Mystic Light, 3x DisplayPort, HDMI, Dual Fan Cooling System'
product_meta.description: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER is powered by the award-winning NVIDIA Turing architecture, bringing superfast all-around performance and graphics to every gamer and creator. It’s time to gear up and get super powers. NVIDIA Turing—the world’s most advanced GPU architecture—fuses next-generation shaders with real-time ray tracing and all-new AI capabilities. This new hybrid graphics capability represents the biggest generational leap ever in gaming GPUs, delivering up to 6X more performance than previous 10 Series NVIDIA Pascal GPUs.
feature_bullets: Boost Clock / Memory Speed : up to 1695 MHz / 14 Gbps / 8 GB GDDR6
TWIN FROZR 7 THERMAL DESIGN includes supremely silent TORX FAN 3.0
Customise your graphics card's settings and RGB Mystic Light (support models with RGB)
Unique MSI Dragon Center offers all software including MYSTIC LIGHT functionality for your MSI gaming product
Digital Maximum Resolution is 7680 x 4320 pixels

specifications.Series: MSI Nvidia RTX2060 Super Gaming X 8GB Fan GDDR6 DP/HDMI PCI Express Graphics Card
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars155 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
